info.title: Job Scraper API
info.description: API for managing companies and job postings scraped from LinkedIn

post.summary: Check if a company exists by name

message.example: Company with this name already exists
An error occurred while creating the company

get.summary: Check if a job posting exists by LinkedIn job ID
get.description: Returns whether a job posting with the given LinkedIn job ID exists in the database

parameters.name: linkedin_job_id
parameters.description: LinkedIn job ID to search for

post.description: Creates a new job posting in the database

company_id.description: Company ID (must exist in companies table)

message.example: Job posting with this LinkedIn ID already exists
An error occurred while creating the job posting

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific job posting

get.summary: Get job posting by LinkedIn job ID
get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific job posting using LinkedIn job ID

UnauthorizedResponse.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

message.example: Valid API key is required. Include X-API-Key header or api_key parameter.
